lead_paragraph: The Capitol Police in Washington said a person had died of a self-inflicted gunshot wound outside the west front of the building.

headline.print_headline: Capitol Is Locked Down After Shots Are Fired
headline.main: U.S. Capitol Locked Down After Shots Are Fired in Apparent Suicide

snippet: The Capitol Police in Washington said a person had died of a self-inflicted gunshot wound outside the west front of the building.
